name: ForgotPassword
description: This test case verify if user is able to set up new password via reset password link
descriptionHtml: This test case verify if user is able to set up new password via reset password link

testStage.description: This test case verify if user is able to set up new password via reset password link

steps.name: Assert reset password message: Reset Password
Check for error toast when resetting password
Check if reset password popup is visible
Assert popup success message: An email has been send to the provided email with further instructions

parameters.name: expectedTitle
parameters.value: An email has been send to the provided email with further instructions

steps.name: Verify if new Password title is visible
Verify if Send button is disabled by default
